column4: here is a question for all , what version are you using now ? 8.04, 9.04, 9.10 and 10.04?

you wanted to know who the ops are
you've got ubuntu installed on a NTFS drive?
no , it is impossible mate, i installed ubuntu in ext4 and there is another partition in my hard driver(ntfs)
yes, I know, I just wanted to make sure what you meant
ah, ah ... maybe we should redesign the client and the server to filter waste messages
